alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 9:36PM EDT until August 17 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TRUMBULL COUNTY... At 936 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Adamsville to Sharpsville to near Canfield, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Warren, Niles, Hubbard, Lordstown, Vienna Center, Hilltop, Maplewood Park, Girard, Vienna, McDonald, Orangeville, Yankee Lake, Brookfield Center, Churchill, West Hill, Mineral Ridge, Bolindale and Howland Center. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
